# GET /v1/betaAppReviewDetails/{id}/relationships/app | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v1/betaAppReviewDetails/{id}/relationships/app ](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-betaAppReviewDetails-_id_-relationships-app)

-  GET /v1/betaAppReviewDetails/{id}/relationships/app 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/betaAppReviewDetails/{id}/relationships/app

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-betaAppReviewDetails-_id_-relationships-app#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/betaAppReviewDetails/{id}/relationships/app
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-betaAppReviewDetails-_id_-relationships-app#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-betaAppReviewDetails-_id_-relationships-app#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[BetaAppReviewDetailAppLinkageResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/betaappreviewdetailapplinkageresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 403 Forbidden``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Forbidden`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 404 Not Found``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Not Found`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 429 ``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)``

 Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-betaAppReviewDetails-_id_-relationships-app#see-also)

### [Getting Beta App Review Details](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-betaAppReviewDetails-_id_-relationships-app#Getting-Beta-App-Review-Details)

[`List Beta App Review Details`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-betaappreviewdetails)Find and list beta app review details for all apps.[`Read Beta App Review Detail Information`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-betaappreviewdetails-_id_)Get beta app review details for a specific app.[`Read the App Information of a Beta App Review Detail`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-betaappreviewdetails-_id_-app)Get the app information for a specific beta app review details resource.
